import React, { ReactDOM } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import RouteSwitch from '../RouteSwitch'; const Nav = ({shopCart, cartDisplay, setCartDisplay, item}) => { const shopCartEle = document.getElementById("shopCart") function shopCartDisplayOnOff() { //shopCartEle.style.display === 'none' ? shopCartEle.style.display = 'flex' : shopCartEle.style.display = 'none' cartDisplay === 'none' ? setCartDisplay('flex') : setCartDisplay('none') } function searchOnChange(input) { console.log(input) } return(

nav

  • Deals

    • */}
searchOnChange(e.target.value)}>
shopCartDisplayOnOff()}>CART {shopCart.length > 0 ? shopCart.length : "0"}
) } export default Nav
